plan_description.value:
1. **Financial Protection**: Provides financial protection to your family.

2. **Smart Exit Benefit**: Get back all premiums paid with Smart Exit Benefit, which can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25, but not during the last 5 policy years.

3. **Premium Break Benefit**: Option to defer premiums by up to 12 months with Premium Break Benefit, applicable only after completion of 5 policy years for a maximum of 12 consecutive months at a time, with a minimum gap of 5 years between each request, subject to a written request at least 30 days (15 days in case of monthly mode policy) in advance, and payment of all outstanding premiums along with the next due premium.

4. **Return of Premium Option**: Get back all premiums paid on survival till maturity with Return of Premium option, available on payment of additional premium(s).

5. **Accelerated Instant Death Benefit**: Provides an accelerated instant death benefit with Immediate Payout on Claim Intimation, applicable for all in-force policies after a waiting period of 1 year.

other_benefits.value:
1. **Smart Exit Benefit**: Provides the option to get back all premiums paid after 25 policy years, but not during the last 5 policy years.

2. **Premium Break Benefit**: Allows deferral of premiums by up to 12 months after completion of 5 policy years, subject to certain conditions.

3. **Return of Premium (ROP) Option**: If selected, the policyholder will receive a return of 100% of the Total Premiums paid upon survival till maturity, available only at policy inception and requires additional premium.

4. **Renewability Option at Maturity**: The policyholder can extend the term of their policy at maturity, with additional premium based on attained age and chosen increase in policy term, subject to conditions.

5. **Option to Alter Premium Frequency**: The policyholder can change the premium payment frequency during the premium payment term.

6. **Accelerated Instant Death Benefit**: Provides an immediate payout on claim intimation after a waiting period of 1 year for all in-force policies.

7. **Maturity Benefit**: On survival until maturity, the policyholder will receive the Sum Assured on Maturity, which is equal to 100% of the Total Premiums Paid if the ROP option is selected, otherwise Nil.

8. **Additional Premiums**: Certain benefits, such as the ROP option, require the payment of additional premiums.

surrender_benefits.value:
1. **Surrender Value** is calculated as the higher of **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)** and **Special Surrender Value (SSV)**.

2. **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)** is determined by the formula: **GSV = GSV Factor% × Total Premiums Paid**.

3. **Special Surrender Value (SSV)** is calculated as the expected present value of:
   i) Paid-up guaranteed future benefits on death, survival/maturity and 
   ii) Accrued / vested benefits, allowing for survival benefits already paid, if any.

4. The discount rate used to calculate the expected present value is:
   - **30%** during the **Premium Payment Term (PPT)** or if all due premiums have not been paid.
   - **50%** post PPT if all due premiums have been paid.

5. The **Surrender Value** will be the higher of **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)** and **Special Surrender Value (SSV)**.

paid_up_value.value:
1. A policy will acquire a **paid-up value** only if: 
   - **Return of Premium** is selected with **Limited Pay/Regular Pay**. 
   - Premiums are paid for at least **1 full year** and after completion of the **first policy year**. 

2. In all other cases, the policy lapses on premium discontinuance without any **paid-up value**. 

3. If a policy has acquired **paid-up value** and stops paying premiums, the following benefits are available: 
   - **Death Benefit** shall be the highest of: 
     - **Sum Assured on Death** × (Total Premiums Paid ÷ Total Premiums Payable) 
     - 105% of Total Premiums Paid 
   - **Maturity Benefit** (where applicable) shall be calculated as: 
     - **Sum Assured on Maturity** × (Total Premiums Paid ÷ Total Premiums Payable) 
   - **Surrender Benefit** shall be calculated as **Surrender Value**. 

4. If the **Return of Premium Option** has been selected, **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)** gets acquired immediately upon payment of premium in case of **Single Pay**. 

5. The **Death Benefit** is applicable on the death of the Life Assured during the policy term, with a lumpsum benefit paid out to the nominee. 

6. The specific details regarding the **paid-up value** or benefits available for this policy are not explicitly stated in the provided documents.

exit_options.value:
1. **Smart Exit Benefit**: The policyholder has the option to receive a Smart Exit Benefit, which is equal to the Total Premiums Paid under the policy. This option can be exercised by cancelling the policy, subject to certain conditions. This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25, but not during the last 5 policy years, and the policy must be in-force at the time of exercising this option. This option is not available if the Return of Premium option has been selected.

2. **Return of Premium Option**: The policy offers a **Return of Premium** option, which allows the policyholder to get back all premiums paid on survival till maturity. This option is available on payment of additional premium(s).

3. **Premium Break Benefit**: The policy provides an option to defer premiums by up to 12 months with the **Premium Break Benefit**, applicable only after completion of 5 policy years for a maximum of 12 consecutive months at a time, with a minimum gap of 5 years between each request, subject to a written request at least 30 days (15 days in case of monthly mode policy) in advance, and payment of all outstanding premiums along with the next due premium.

4. **Accelerated Instant Death Benefit**: The policy includes an **Accelerated Instant Death Benefit** of ₹5 Lakhs with Immediate Payout on Claim Intimation, applicable for all in-force policies after a waiting period of 1 year.

5. **Conditions for Smart Exit Benefit**: The Smart Exit Benefit can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25, but not during the last 5 policy years, and the policy must be in-force at the time of exercising this option. 

6. **Exclusions for Smart Exit Benefit**: The Smart Exit Benefit option shall not be available where the Return of Premium option has been selected.

1. **Smart Exit Benefit**: This option allows the policyholder to get back all premiums paid, but it can only be exercised in any policy year greater than 25, and not during the last 5 policy years.

2. **Premium Break Benefit**: This benefit allows the policyholder to defer premiums by up to 12 months, applicable only after completion of 5 policy years. A minimum gap of 5 years is required between each request, and a written request must be submitted at least 30 days in advance (15 days for monthly mode policies). All outstanding premiums must be paid along with the next due premium.

3. **Return of Premium Option**: This option allows the policyholder to get back all premiums paid on survival till maturity, available on payment of additional premium(s).

4. **Conditions for Exit Options**: The exit options can be availed under specific conditions as mentioned above, including the timing of the request and the completion of certain policy years. 

5. **Accelerated Instant Death Benefit**: This benefit provides an immediate payout on claim intimation, applicable for all in-force policies after a waiting period of 1 year.

1. **HDFC Life Income Benefit on Accidental Disability Rider**: This rider provides a benefit equal to 1% of the Rider Sum Assured per month for the next 10 years in the event of an Accidental Total Permanent Disability. There is no maturity benefit available under this rider.

2. **HDFC Life Protect Plus Rider**: This rider offers a benefit as a proportion of the Rider Sum Assured in case of accidental death or partial/total disability due to an accident, or if diagnosed with cancer as per the chosen option. No maturity benefit is payable under this rider.

3. **HDFC Life Health Plus Rider**: This rider provides a lump sum benefit equivalent to the Rider Sum Assured upon diagnosis of any of the covered 60 Critical Illnesses, or a proportionate benefit on diagnosis of Early Stage Cancer / Major Cancer depending on the chosen plan option. No maturity benefit is payable under this rider.

4. **HDFC Life Waiver of Premium Rider**: Information regarding the benefits of this rider is not available in the provided documents.
